div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 253 Crete, before 1914 Burial: mid 2nd cent. B.C. (Oeconomides) Contents: 17+ AR Histiaea: 11 tetrob. (Grose 5762-72) Aegina: 1 ob. (Grose 6034) Sicyon: 1 or 2 ob. (Grose 6285 and perhaps 6284) Cydonia: 1 ob. (Grose 7087) Itanus: 3 ob. (Grose 7135-7) Disposition: Cambridge 17 or 18 Robert, Hellenica 11-2 (1960), p. 67, note 1 Le Rider, Monn. cr√©t., p. 221
